Blog.post: Yippie the day is almost over ~ i am so glad i only have 1hr and half left of work. even though i have not done much, i guess i better do something tomorrow or i will be behind in my work. i guess i have the summer time blues i rather be out and about doing fun summer stuff instead of being stuck inside having to work. I miss being a kid ~ sleeping late and doing hardly anyting all day long, it was fun being a kid. and when we were kids we could not wait to grow up. if i could only do it again i would sleep more and have a lot more fun being a kid and not wanting to grow up so darn fast. well i am just wasting time till break i do need to get something done before break so hope everyone out there is having a good day ~

Well I just wanted to say its 8am and nothing going on really been at work for an 2 hrs now. I have not gotten much work done today. Cause I just don't feel like it. Do any of you have one of those days you just don't fee like working at all? I have a lot of these days. Well its break time so I guess I will go to break and get me something to eat for breakfast. I really hope that my friends check out my site and start posting. It just might be fun. Off I go to break

I am happy that it is FRIDAY ~ BUT I still have to work tomorrow so that kinda stinks but hopefully I get caught up on my work but I really doubt it, I am thinking that since I am not really going to get caught up I should just stay home and not come into work but then I think about the over time so that makes me want to come in tomorrow, also my sister is going to be here tonight so I kinda want to stay home tomorrow incase she wants to do something. I guess I will decide before I leave tonight.

The theory is that you will learn a lot of little known facts about your friends. It is fun and easy. if you would like to answer the questions you can comment back with you answers. 1. WHAT IS YOUR WHOLE NAME? Heather Dawn Stone 2. WHAT COLOR PANTS ARE YOU WEARING? jeans! yay jeans! 3. WHAT ARE YOU LISTENING TO RIGHT NOW? The Ryan Seacrest Morning Show 4. WHAT DID YOU DO LAST NIGHT? Watched Big Brother 5 and amazing race 5.. WHAT WAS THE LAST THING YOU ATE? Peaches and Blue Bell homemade vanilla ice cream 6. IF YOU WERE A CRAYON, WHAT COLOR WOULD YOU BE? Orange! 7. HOW IS THE WEATHER RIGHT NOW? TOO hot!!!!!! but actually pretty nice for July! I agree with you brandie :) 8. LAST PERSON YOU TALKED TO ON THE PHONE? My aunt cindy 9. THE FIRST THING YOU NOTICE ABOUT THE OPPOSITE SEX? I like the eyes 10. DO YOU LIKE THE PERSON WHO SENT YOU THIS? Yes I like all the people that sent this to me 11. HOW ARE YOU TODAY? Tired, I overslept this morning ready to get off of work 12. FAVORITE DRINK? water 13. FAVORITE ALCOHOLIC DRINK? Really don't have one right now I guess a margarita since I had one this weekend 14. FAVORITE SPORT? holding down the couch!! :) I am with you on this one 15. HAIR COLOR? blondish brown, i guess! 16. EYE COLOR? hazel 17. SUNRISE OR SUNSET? sunset!! i'm not a morning gal! I am with you on this one too 18. CHILDREN AND THEIR AGES? none at the moment! i have doggies! Me too 19. FAVORITE MONTH? I am going to go with august 20. FAVORITE FOOD? Italian 21. LAST MOVIE YOU WATCHED? Wow I watched on about a month ago but can't remember what it was. Oh well. 22. FAVORITE DAY OF THE WEEK? Friday after 2:30 23. FAVORITE HOBBIES? Hanging out with friends and family 26. SUMMER OR WINTER? I like both.. me too! I like spring and fall 27. HUGS OR KISSES? Depends on who is giving them to me. But I like them both 28. RELATIONSHIPS OR ONE NIGHT STANDS? Relationship with a one night stand on the side ~ hehehe just kidding 29. CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA? Vanilla with chocolate syrup on top 30. DO YOU WANT YOUR FRIENDS TO WRITE BACK? I am the last one to do this I think 31. WHO IS MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND? Melissa has not done this yet 32. WHO IS LEAST LIKELY TO RESPOND? i have not a clue! 33. LIVING ARRANGEMENTS? Me, james, precious, baby, and buster 34. WHAT BOOKS ARE YOU READING? I am fixing to start reading the bible 35. WHAT'S ON YOUR MOUSE PAD? My mouse :) nothing its plain 36. FAVORITE BOARD GAME? Monopoly and life 37. CAN YOU TOUCH YOUR NOSE WITH YOUR TONGUE? no 38. CAN YOU CROSS ONE EYE AT A TIME? no, i sure can't! 39. ARE YOU A ROMANTIC? I think I try to be sometimes but usually not I rather the guy be romantic 40. DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF LUCKY? Yes I am very lucky to have a wonderful family and have the greatest friends ever

i finally made it to the weekend thank goodness. i am going to go get my cousin so she can spend the night with me tonight its going to be so much fun. i have not figured out what we are going to do tonight but i know we are going to take her out to eat and we have to go to wal mart so we will probably buy her a toy who know what all we will do, but i can't wait to go get her. i am so ready for this three day weekend. we are having a wedding shower for one of my cousins on saturday its going to be fun to see my family. i am out of here till tuesday. YEAH ~

I am so happy it is Friday ~ i am so ready for this three day weekend!!!!! i get to sleep in and get some rest. last night i cooked dinner for my friends and it went really well except when it came to make the gravy it was not to bad but it was nothing like what my mom makes. i need to practice more on the gravy. but everything came out pretty good. next time i think i will make an easier meal for everyone. when i get off of work today i am going to go and pick up my 5 yr old cousin to stay the night with us tonight. thats going to be lots of fun. i don't know what all we are going to do but i did think about taking her out to eat and just going out and messing around and maybe that will wear her out so when we get home she will go to bed pretty easy. well its time to get to work and get this day over with.

I only have an hour left of work yea!! I am so excited to get out of here so I can get to the grocery store and get home and clean up the house really quick and start cooking. I hope everything goes well. I hope to don't screw up dinner or anything that would suck. I hope I can make the gravy!! Well not I only have 30 mins left I started writing this and got sidetracked and started doing something else and I am just now getting back on here to finish this up. Well I am going to clean my desk and get out of here ~ YEA ME

I am so sleepy i just wanted to stay home and sleep somemore. and i can't go home and take a nap like i usually do i have company coming over cause its my turn to make dinner. me and my two friends brandie and melissa came up with a plan to take turns cooking and everyone come to that persons house for dinner. melissa made something tuesday i can't remember what she called it but it was really good. and tonight is my turn i am making everyone chicken fried steak and all the good stuff to go with it. i need to clean up a little before they come over. i guess i should have done that yesterday but i went to church then went over to my aunts house and helped her shave her dog, that was the biggest mess i had dog hair all over me YUK. and i did not get home to late. i really hope i get in bed before 10 tonight but i doubt that will happen but i am really wanting to. i need to get some sleep before friday because my 5 yr old cousin is staying the night with me so i need my energy for her. she will keep me going. lets all hope that this day goes by really really fast.
